name: Moto Racing (TransGame668)
description:
Contains 20 race circuit track. each scene had a big race track (like the real one), small circuit, and also there a floating circuit too. Just ride the motorbike in to the finish line and try not to crash/falling the player down. If you falling when racing Press Restart Button (Showing in top right corner). If you wanna go back to Main Menu Scene Press "L" Keys. The finish line is Small, Better slow down when you see it. To controls the player use arrow keys or Press W, A, S, D Keys for movement.

If the game is not perfect enough, Please forgive me...

Special Thanks for Mehdi Rabiee. Credits In Game Only.
